titleInfo.title: Interacting quantum and classical continuous systems - I. The piecewise deterministic dynamics

mods.abstract: A mathematical construction of a Markov-Feller process associated with a completely positive coupling between classical and quantum systems is proposed. The example of the free classical particle on the Lobatchevski space Q interacting with the quantum system characterized by coherent states on Q is considered.
